description: A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a head struck by a simplistic depiction of a lightning, with an arrow pointing down in a corner next to the scene.  <well_worn>

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a pillow with "zZz" over it and two pluses next to it in a corner.  <well_worn>

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a head with a large arrow pointing down laid over it, with a shield in a corner next to the scene.  <well_worn>

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a head with an open book laid over it, with a magnifying glass in a corner next to the scene.  <well_worn>

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a head with an open book laid over it, with an arrow pointing up in a corner next to the scene.  <well_worn>

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a picture of the lower half of a head, with a focus on the lips; a fist and a feather framing the head from the sides.  <well_worn>

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a muscle cuirass with a knife laid over it.  <well_worn>

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a muscle cuirass with a large droplet laid over it.  <well_worn>

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a picture of the lower half of a head, with a focus on the lips; a handshake is below the chin.  <well_worn>

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of three humans; the one on the left is holding an assault rifle; the one on the right is holding a knife and charging left; and the one in the middle facing the knife wielder, with a shield behind their back, from where the bullets are coming.  <well_worn>

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a muscle cuirass with a simplified bolt of lightning laid over it.  <well_worn>
A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a heart with a shield next to it.  <well_worn>
A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suit or the capital A in the center of the face, there's a picture of a human brain.  <well_worn>
